hook.text: Bill Gates warned in 2015 that a pandemic would kill more people than nuclear war. Nobody prepared.

buildup.text: Pandemic preparedness means stockpiling supplies, building surveillance systems, and planning responses before a crisis.

climax.text: The cost of pandemic preparedness is a fraction of the cost of an unprepared pandemic response.

punchline.text: The best time to prepare was yesterday. The next best is now.

quiz.question: Why is pandemic preparedness politically difficult?
options: Funding prevention doesn't produce visible results that win votes
Preparedness is more expensive than responding to a pandemic
Scientists disagree on whether pandemics will ever happen again
